name: SBV Solutions - Strategic Business Velocity
tag_list: startups, startup-company, software, software-sales, venture-capitalist, sales, sales-help, sales-assistance, getting-customers, social-media
overview:
SBV Solutions is uniquely dedicated to creating an advanced business velocity for new company sales and new product introductions. Our goal is to create an acceleration of sales and business growth for your company - whether you are a young company yourself trying to get sales or you are a Venture Group with companies in your portfolio who may be underperforming….

SBV Solutions is not a consulting company. We are your feet on the street and a direct route to our high value customer contacts. SBV has the established seasoned team to engage and develop the value proposition to market, sell and grow your product.

IF YOU ARE A VENTURE Group: As a VC, there are some great products in development, but you may have some companies in your portfolio that are failing to gain market and customer adoption. The problem could stem from lack of a seasoned sales and operations professional team.

SBV Solutions can help: we are not a consulting company just giving advice. We are the hands-on group that will develop a value proposition, field our team, engage prospective clients and close significant business now. SBV Solutions is your route to market and rapid customer access.
